english.segment1: Wait, what a beautiful place. Sun breaking through to my face. My face, my face. Please, get me off of my knees. I'm just begging you please. Please, please
english.segment2: I'll be taking you right by the hand. I know that you dont understand
english.segment3: Break, you're breaking on through the day. Helping me finding my way. The way, the way. Time, is now on my side. My side, my side
english.segment4: I'll be taking you right by the hand. I know that you dont understand.
